titles.title: CB 27 Jesus, Name Above All Names

properties.copyright: a Â©1974, 1978 Scripture in Song (Maranatha! Music)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
JESUS, NAME ABOVE ALL NAMES
Beautiful Savior, glorious Lord;
Emmanuel, God is with us,
Blessed Redeemer, living Word.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jehovah, I AM who I AM,
God the Creator, Lord God of Hosts.
Abba, heavenly Father,
God of all comfort, Ancient of Days.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Helper, Holy Spirit,
Teacher of all things, Giver of gifts.
The Comforter, Spirit of promise,
Seal of salvation, Guide into truth.
